verses.verse: וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> become מִיָּמִ֜ים <WH3117> But it came to pass within a while after בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> in the time קְצִיר־ <WH7105> harvest חִטִּ֗ים <WH2406> of wheat וַיִּפְקֹ֨ד <WH6485> visited שִׁמְשׁ֤וֹן <WH8123> that Samson אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <WH802> his wife בִּגְדִ֣י <WH1423> A young עִזִּ֔ים <WH5795> goat וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and he said אָבֹ֥אָה <WH935> I will go in אֶל־ <WH413> to אִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH802> to my wife הֶחָ֑דְרָה <WH2315> into the chamber וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not נְתָנ֥וֹ <WH5414> would not suffer אָבִ֖יהָ <WH1> But her father לָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> him to go in

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אָבִ֗יהָ <WH1> And her father אָמֹ֤ר <WH559> I verily אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH559> thought כִּי־ <WH3588> that שָׂנֹ֣א <WH8130> that thou hadst utterly שְׂנֵאתָ֔הּ <WH8130> hated וָאֶתְּנֶ֖נָּה <WH5414> her therefore I gave לְמֵרֵעֶ֑ךָ <WH4828> her to thy companion הֲלֹ֨א <WH3808> not אֲחֹתָ֤הּ <WH269> sister הַקְּטַנָּה֙ <WH6996> [is] not her younger טוֹבָ֣ה <WH2896> fairer מִמֶּ֔נָּה <WH4480> than תְּהִי־ <WH1961> become נָ֥א <WH4994> Please לְךָ֖ תַּחְתֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH8478> instead

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <WH8123> And Samson נִקֵּ֥יתִי <WH5352> shall I be more blameless הַפַּ֖עַם <WH6471> concerning them Now מִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> than the Philistines כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> though I do אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I עִמָּ֖ם <WH5973> them רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> them a displeasure

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <WH8123> And Samson וַיִּלְכֹּ֖ד <WH3920> and caught שְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> three מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred שׁוּעָלִ֑ים <WH7776> foxes וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> and took לַפִּדִ֗ים <WH3940> firebrands וַיֶּ֤פֶן <WH6437> and turned זָנָב֙ <WH2180> tail אֶל־ <WH413> to זָנָ֔ב <WH2180> to tail וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> and put לַפִּ֥יד <WH3940> firebrand אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> a בֵּין־ <WH996> between שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> between two הַזְּנָב֖וֹת <WH2180> tails בַּתָּֽוֶךְ׃ <WH8432> in the midst

וַיַּבְעֶר־ <WH1197> And when he had set אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> on fire בַּלַּפִּידִ֔ים <WH3940> the brands וַיְשַׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> he let [them] go בְּקָמ֣וֹת <WH7054> into the standing corn פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיַּבְעֵ֛ר <WH1197> and burnt up מִגָּדִ֥ישׁ <WH1430> both the shocks וְעַד־ <WH5704> along קָמָ֖ה <WH7054> and also the standing corn וְעַד־ <WH5704> along כֶּ֥רֶם <WH3754> with the vineyards זָֽיִת׃ <WH2132> [and] olives

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> said פְלִשְׁתִּים֮ <WH6430> Then the Philistines מִ֣י <WH4310> Who עָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> Who hath done זֹאת֒ <WH2063> likewise וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> this? And they answered שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <WH8123> Samson חֲתַ֣ן <WH2860> the son in law הַתִּמְנִ֔י <WH8554> of the Timnite כִּ֚י <WH3588> because לָקַ֣ח <WH3947> because he had taken אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> his wife וַֽיִּתְּנָ֖הּ <WH5414> and given לְמֵרֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH4828> her to his companion וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> came up פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> And the Philistines וַיִּשְׂרְפ֥וּ <WH8313> and burnt אוֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֖יהָ <WH1> her and her father בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <WH8123> And Samson אִֽם־ <WH518> unto them Though תַּעֲשׂ֖וּן <WH6213> ye have done כָּזֹ֑את <WH2063> this כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> Since נִקַּ֥מְתִּי <WH5358> yet will I be avenged בָכֶ֖ם וְאַחַ֥ר <WH310> of you and after אֶחְדָּֽל׃ <WH2308> that I will cease

וַיַּ֨ךְ <WH5221> And he smote אוֹתָ֥ם <WH853> שׁ֛וֹק <WH7785> them hip עַל־ <WH5921> and יָרֵ֖ךְ <WH3409> thigh מַכָּ֣ה <WH4347> slaughter גְדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> with a great וַיֵּ֣רֶד <WH3381> and he went down וַיֵּ֔שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt בִּסְעִ֖יף <WH5585> in the top סֶ֥לַע <WH5553> of the rock עֵיטָֽם׃ <WH5862> Etam ס

וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> went up פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> Then the Philistines וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בִּיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> in Judah וַיִּנָּטְשׁ֖וּ <WH5203> and spread בַּלֶּֽחִי׃ <WH3896> themselves in Lehi

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah לָמָ֖ה <WH4100> Why עֲלִיתֶ֣ם <WH5927> Why are ye come up עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> against וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> against us? And they answered לֶאֱס֤וֹר <WH631> To bind אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <WH8123> Samson עָלִ֔ינוּ <WH5927> are we come up לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to do ל֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> to him עָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> to him as he hath done לָֽנוּ׃

וַיֵּרְד֡וּ <WH3381> went שְׁלֹשֶׁת֩ <WH7969> Then three אֲלָפִ֨ים <WH505> thousand אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> men מִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶל־ <WH413> to סְעִיף֮ <WH5585> to the top סֶ֣לַע <WH5553> of the rock עֵיטָם֒ <WH5862> Etam וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said לְשִׁמְשׁ֗וֹן <WH8123> to Samson הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <WH3045> Knowest כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מֹשְׁלִ֥ים <WH4910> [are] rulers בָּ֙נוּ֙ פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> thou not that the Philistines וּמַה־ <WH4100> What זֹּ֖את <WH2063> that עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> over us? what [is] this [that] thou hast done לָּ֑נוּ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> unto us? And he said לָהֶ֔ם כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> to them עָ֣שׂוּ <WH6213> unto them As they did לִ֔י כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so עָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> unto me so have I done לָהֶֽם׃

וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <WH559> And they said לוֹ֙ לֶאֱסָרְךָ֣ <WH631> to bind יָרַ֔דְנוּ <WH3381> unto him We are come down לְתִתְּךָ֖ <WH5414> thee that we may deliver בְּיַד־ <WH3027> thee into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <WH8123> And Samson הִשָּׁבְע֣וּ <WH7650> unto them Swear לִ֔י פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> you will not תִּפְגְּע֥וּן <WH6293> unto me that ye will not fall upon בִּ֖י אַתֶּֽם׃ <WH859> you

וַיֹּ֧אמְרוּ <WH559> And they spake ל֣וֹ לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> unto him saying לֹ֚א <WH3808> No כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָסֹ֤ר <WH631> No but we will bind נֶֽאֱסָרְךָ֙ <WH631> thee fast וּנְתַנּ֣וּךָ <WH5414> and deliver בְיָדָ֔ם <WH3027> thee into their hand וְהָמֵ֖ת <WH4191> but surely לֹ֣א <WH3808> No נְמִיתֶ֑ךָ <WH4191> we will not kill וַיַּאַסְרֻ֗הוּ <WH631> thee And they bound בִּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> him with two עֲבֹתִ֣ים <WH5688> cords חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <WH2319> new וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּהוּ <WH5927> and brought him up מִן־ <WH4480> from הַסָּֽלַע׃ <WH5553> from the rock

הוּא־ <WH1931> he בָ֣א <WH935> [And] when he came עַד־ <WH5704> against לֶ֔חִי <WH3896> unto Lehi וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> the Philistines הֵרִ֣יעוּ <WH7321> shouted לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <WH7125> against וַתִּצְלַ֨ח <WH6743> came mightily עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> and ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> him and the Spirit יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַתִּהְיֶ֨ינָה <WH1961> become הָעֲבֹתִ֜ים <WH5688> upon him and the cords אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> were on זְרוֹעוֹתָ֗יו <WH2220> that [were] upon his arms כַּפִּשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6593> became as flax אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> is בָּעֲר֣וּ <WH1197> that was burnt בָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> with fire וַיִּמַּ֥סּוּ <WH4549> loosed אֱסוּרָ֖יו <WH612> and his bands מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from יָדָֽיו׃ <WH3027> from off his hands

וַיִּמְצָ֥א <WH4672> And he found לְחִֽי־ <WH3895> jawbone חֲמ֖וֹר <WH2543> of an ass טְרִיָּ֑ה <WH2961> a new וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> and put forth יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand וַיִּקָּחֶ֔הָ <WH3947> and took וַיַּךְ־ <WH5221> it and slew בָּ֖הּ אֶ֥לֶף <WH505> a thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <WH8123> And Samson בִּלְחִ֣י <WH3895> With the jawbone הַחֲמ֔וֹר <WH2543> of an ass חֲמ֖וֹר <WH2563> clay חֲמֹרָתָ֑יִם <WH2563> clay בִּלְחִ֣י <WH3895> with the jaw הַחֲמ֔וֹר <WH2543> of an ass הִכֵּ֖יתִי <WH5221> have I slain אֶ֥לֶף <WH505> a thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become כְּכַלֹּת֣וֹ <WH3615> And it came to pass when he had made an end לְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> of speaking וַיַּשְׁלֵ֥ךְ <WH7993> that he cast away הַלְּחִ֖י <WH3895> the jawbone מִיָּד֑וֹ <WH3027> out of his hand וַיִּקְרָ֛א <WH7121> and called לַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> that place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he רָ֥מַת לֶֽחִי׃ <WH7437> Ramathlehi

וַיִּצְמָא֮ <WH6770> athirst מְאֹד֒ <WH3966> And he was sore וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> and called אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> on the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said אַתָּה֙ <WH859> You נָתַ֣תָּ <WH5414> Thou hast given בְיַֽד־ <WH3027> into the hand עַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> of thy servant אֶת־ <WH853> הַתְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <WH8668> deliverance הַגְּדֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> this great הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> and now אָמ֣וּת <WH4191> and now shall I die בַּצָּמָ֔א <WH6772> for thirst וְנָפַלְתִּ֖י <WH5307> and fall בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> into the hand הָעֲרֵלִֽים׃ <WH6189> uncircumcised

וַיִּבְקַ֨ע <WH1234> clave אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> But God אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּכְתֵּ֣שׁ <WH4388> an hollow place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בַּלֶּ֗חִי <WH3895> that [was] in the jaw וַיֵּצְא֨וּ <WH3318> and there came מִמֶּ֤נּוּ <WH4480> that מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> water וַיֵּ֔שְׁתְּ <WH8354> thereout and when he had drunk וַתָּ֥שָׁב <WH7725> came again רוּח֖וֹ <WH7307> his spirit וַיֶּ֑חִי <WH2421> and he revived עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֣ן ׀ <WH3651> after that קָרָ֣א <WH7121> wherefore he called שְׁמָ֗הּ <WH8034> the name עֵ֤ין הַקּוֹרֵא֙ <WH5875> thereof Enhakkore אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּלֶּ֔חִי <WH3896> which [is] in Lehi עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֧ט <WH8199> And he judged אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Israel בִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> in the days פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> of the Philistines עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years פ
